Actions.Name: Delete row
Actions.Description: Deletes a row from a DB2 table

Actions.Name: Get row
Actions.Description: Retrieves a single row from a DB2 table

Actions.Name: Get rows
Actions.Description: Retrieves rows from a DB2 table

Actions.Name: Get tables
Actions.Description: Retrieves tables from a DB2 database

Actions.Name: Update row
Actions.Description: Updates an existing row in a DB2 table

Actions.Name: Insert row
Actions.Description: Inserts a new row into a DB2 table
